questions.question_text:
A sales representative at Northern Trail Outfitters needs to securely send confidential product roadmap information to a premier customer.
Which two steps should be taken to send this information using content delivery? (Choose two.)

choices.D: Require the customer to enter a password to view the content.
choices.C: Require the recipient to log into Salesforce to access the content.
choices.B: Remove access to the content after a specified date.
choices.A: Require the customer to enter a security token to download the content.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BD
B,D is correct.

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks has just deployed all of its configurations. The admin wants to build a new process using objects that were deployed.

Which best practice should a consultant recommend to the admin?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
A Developer sandbox lacks real data and isn’t ideal for testing processes that involve complex relationships. Also, "test release environment" isn’t a standard best practice for Salesforce development cycles.

choices.A: Build in a Partial Copy sandbox and test changes in the staging environment.
choices.B: Build in a test release environment and test changes in a Partial Copy sandbox.
choices.C: Build in a Developer sandbox and test changes in a test release environment.
